value.title: DAX Fridays! #9: RANKX DAX Function
value.excerpt: Learn how to use the DAX RANKX() function to arrange your data based on criteria that you specify.  Keynotes: 00:00 Intro 03:00 Rankx on categories 03:17 Rankx ascending or descending 03:35 Rankx with allselected  05:28 Rank with blanks 05:28 07:26 Rank on products 07:26 10:50  Rank with column 10:50

value.title: Running totals in power query??? Yes, you can :)
value.excerpt: In today's video, I am going to show you how you can do running totals or cummulative totals in Power Query, but do this only if you have no way to do it using DAX.  Also, I will show you how List.Range work, really cool function :)  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center

value.title: Avoid Left Outer Joins with DirectQuery in Power BI
